citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00-11:15 AM on
June 13, 2023. Upon arrival, inspector knocked on the door and then called the available phone numbers and left voice
messages. Prior to leaving the facility, both numbers were called again and voice messages left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00-11:15 AM on 
June 13, 2023. Upon arrival, inspector knocked on the door and then called the available phone numbers and left voice 
messages. Prior to leaving the facility, both numbers were called again and voice messages left. 
 
 
End Section
